p: Continuing the chemical characterization of essential oils of aromatic and medicinal plants from Côte d’Ivoire [ 10, 11, 12, 13, 14], we now report on the chemical composition of the leaf essential oil from I. dewevrei, along with isolation and structure elucidation of three new natural sesquiterpenes as well as description of NMR data of a fourth sesquiterpene.
